MONL.content: master does not have exclusive possession of anything, only possesses, usurps unnaturally, rapes, colonizes through “unnatural process of politico-phantasmatic constructions”

MONL.content: all culture is originally colonial: unilateral imposition of “politics” of language

MONL.content: language of the other, promised language [which doesn’t exist], entirely other [tout autre] than language of the other as language of colonist > there are unsettling resemblances
